prod_short_desc: Engage the Stone stomper with Macy’s Bot Drop Dragon!
prod_long_desc:
Pit the flying Stone stomper against Macy and the buildable Bot Drop Dragon, featuring 2 wings with mounted stud shooters, minifigure cockpit, movable tail and Macy Bot release function. The Stone stomper’s shield can be used as a hoverboard to role-play an aerial dog fight scene. Includes one scannable shield and 3 minifigures.
Includes 3 minifigures: Macy, a Macy Bot and a Stone stomper.
Macy’s buildable robot dragon features a minifigure cockpit, shield holder, 2 movable wings with stud shooters and a movable tail.
Launch the Macy Bot from the dragon’s belly!
Attach the mace or NEXO Power to the tip of the dragon’s tail for extra attack power.
Weapons include Macy’s mace, the Macy Bot’s mace and the Stone stomper’s crossbow stud shooter.
Also includes the Stone stomper’s hoverboard with 2 lightning wing elements.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents’ permission.
Scan shields for the NEXO Power Burnt Hot Dog and power up in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game!
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ characters on Cartoon Network.
Combine the dragon with a LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ Battle Suit to create an ultimate battle suit.
Dragon measures over 3” high, 7” long and 5” wide.
